policies.title: Privacy Policies
policies.subtitle: Our Commitment to Your Privacy
policies.p1: This is a demo application. No real data is stored on any server. All your trading data, including your virtual wallet and transaction history, is stored exclusively in your browser's local storage. This means your data remains on your computer and is not accessible by us or any third party.
policies.p2: Your API keys for services like Google AI are also stored only in your local environment variables and are never transmitted to our servers. They are used directly from your browser to communicate with the respective API provider, ensuring maximum security and privacy.
policies.p3: Since we do not collect or store any personal data, there is no risk of your information being sold or shared. If you clear your browser's cache or local storage, all your simulation data will be permanently deleted.
